title: "Applied Data Analytics"

## Overview

Course will cover the following:

- data fetching/preprocessing
- specialized data types:
  - geospatial
  - financial
  - supply chain management
  - more
- visualization/presentation (e.g. Gradio)
- LLM toolkits (LangChain/LangFlow/MLFlow)
- MLOps
- Amazon Web Services
- Docker
